Title: Relates to the definition of income in relation to the enhanced STAR exemption
Summary: Includes distribution from a thrift savings plan in the definition of income in relation to the enhanced STAR exemption.
LawCode: Amd ยง425, RPT L; amd ยง606, Tax L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law and the tax law, in relation to the definition of income in relation to the enhanced STAR exemption
